extension
Class TestGraph

java.lang.Object
  extension.TestGraph

public class TestGraph
extends java.lang.Object

This class knows all TestClasses that are run. It checks the dependencies for cycles and runs all the TestMethods of a class.

Author:
Lea Haensenberger (lhaensenberger at students.unibe.ch)

TestGraph

public TestGraph()
Method Detail

getInstance

public static TestGraph getInstance()

addClass

public void addClass(TestClass testClass)
              throws org.junit.internal.runners.InitializationError
All the Method's of the TestClass are checked for cycles in the dependencies and are validated. If erverything is ok, the Method's are wrapped and added to the graph. After that, the dependencies are added to the TestMethod's.

Parameters:
testClass - the TestClass to be added
Throws:
org.junit.internal.runners.InitializationError

descriptionForClass

public org.junit.runner.Description descriptionForClass(TestClass testClass)
The Description's for the Method's of this class are added as children to the class description. If there are dependencies from TestMethod's which are not declared in a TestClass that is run in this turn, the Description of the declaring Class is also added as a child.

Parameters:
testClass - the TestClass to get the Description from
Returns:
the description for testClass;

runClass

public void runClass(TestClass testClass,
                     org.junit.runner.notification.RunNotifier notifier)
All TestMethod's of testClass are run, incl. their dependencies.

Parameters:
testClass - the TestClass to be run
notifier - RunNotifier

getTestMethods

public java.util.Map<java.lang.reflect.Method,TestMethod> getTestMethods()
Only for testing purposes

Returns:
a Map with the mapping Method -> TestMethod

getClasses

public java.util.Set<TestClass> getClasses()
Only for testing purposes

Returns:
a Set of TestClass Objects
